title: RWD85 An Emulation of the KEYNOTE-189 Trial Using Electronic Health Records
details: D Merola, U Campbell, D Lenis, A Madsen… - Value in Health, 2024
abstract: Objectives As a pilot exercise to assess feasibility of using routine clinical practice data to duplicate randomized control trial (RCT) design, we attempted to emulate the KEYNOTE-189 RCT using real-world data (RWD), and report findings from …

title: Continuous Predictive Modeling of Clinical Notes and ICD Codes in Patient Health Records
details: M Hernandez Caralt, CBL Ng, M Rei - arXiv e-prints, 2024
abstract: Abstract Electronic Health Records (EHR) serve as a valuable source of patient information, offering insights into medical histories, treatments, and outcomes. Previous research has developed systems for detecting applicable ICD codes that …
